intro: This document serves as the Product Specification and User Manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) CLC+ Backbone Raster Product 2021, a vital component of the new CLC+ Product Suite. It provides comprehensive information for users, detailing the product's characteristics, production methodologies, quality assessment, and usage guidelines. As an object-oriented, large-scale, high-resolution inventory of European land cover, the CLC+ Backbone offers a pixel-based, multi-temporal raster product with a 10m spatial resolution and 11 basic land cover classes, derived from Copernicus Sentinel-2 time-series data.
